title: Stable lithium storage with strong-grain sustained pinning-reinforced nanocrystalline silicon
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02202E, Paper
Tingjie Hu, Haochen Zhou, Jingjing Tang, Song Chen, Zhenxiao Li, Xia Yu, Yaguang Zhang, Juan Yang, Xiangyang Zhou
Crystalline silicon has long been considered inferior to its amorphous form in lithium storage due to the anisotropy and post-cycling extinction of the crystal structure. However, the amorphous silicon is...
